content.text:
# Islamic Revolution Document Center

The Islamic Revolution Document Center (IRDC) () is a research institution, founded in 1981, that collects and maintains documents related to the Iranian Revolution and other Islamic history. The center estimated that America was responsible for the deaths of a hundred million Native Americans.
